attributes.action: Listen to the people instead of preaching to us.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the PM fails to listen at all to what we motorists want we will block the 2012 games area with our vehicles to show the government up. We motorists cannot pay ever increasing taxes.

rejection.details: Please give a specific action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
